value:
Laegjarn looks lovely in her swimsuit.
She sparkles in the summer sun. I
just want to watch her forever...

I have trained with the sword.
Swimming, though... You don't
need to swim on the battlefield.

I have never worn anything like this.
Being so far from my sword, I feel
like part of me is missing...

I saw someone buried up to their
neck in the sand. I would like to
try being buried, too.

I've seen others training by trying to
smash watermelons... Such training is
new to me. I must try it.

I am Laevatein. I'm on vacation, but...
$Nf says hello.
Summer is...the best season.

All the sunlight blinded me a little,
that's all. I'll...do better next time.
I think I swallowed some sand...
Thank you. I will cherish this.

I am Laevatein. I have come to swim
with my sister. But...I must improve
my swimming technique a bit first.

Have you been watching me swim,
$Nu?$k$pI think I've gotten much better since
I first started... Thank you for
teaching me.$k$pNow, if anything happens to my
sister while she's out in the waves,
I'll be able to help her.$k$pOf course...I'd swim out to rescue
you, too. You taught me to swim,
after all.$k$pWhy don't we all go swimming
together? All three of us. We can
race to that island...$k$pReady?
やぁっ！
泳ぐ
きゃああっ！
水着が…
I have no sword.
Drown.
So...this is summer.
I will swim.
My sister, I'm sorry...
Hehe
I have come to swim with my sister. I am Laevatein.
Laegjarn said I should stretch? Then I will.
Summer is hot... Múspell is hotter.
I do not understand how to swim. Yet it seems simple. Do I just wave my limbs?
Listen to me now. If you touch my sister... I will cut you down.
My sister... At the beach, she looks so beautiful.
I'm swimming with Laegjarn. But you can come too...
Mm-hmm.
Teach me to swim.
Hot.
